name: Abandon
description:
This is the first level of a work in progress created for the Minijam 65 game game of October 2020. 

A 2D platformer in a dark, foreboding world where one is trying to escape from the guilt of the past to a better future. Fragments of your past life lay scattered and hidden thoughout the world and must be recovered and understood for you to move forward and out of the Abandon world.

A video game by Martin Starešinčić &  Will Leamon
